rules_text:
When Badast enters or dies, search your library for a card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life unless it's a distinguished card. [i](Legendary cards and cards with power, toughness, or mana value 5 or greater are distinguished.)[/i]
{2}{B}{B}, Sacrifice Badast, Pay 1 life: Draw a card. [i](You may draw after you search.)[/i]
